channel.title: java on 我的网络记事本
channel.description: Recent content in java on 我的网络记事本

item.title: Java8 行为参数化传递
item.description: Lambda 表达式 1 (String s) ->s.lenght() int fun(String s) { return s.lenght; } 2 (Apple a) -> a.getWeight() > 150 boolean fun(Apple a ) { return a.getWeight > 150; } 3 (int x, int y) -> { System.out.println("r:"); System.out.println(x + 7); } void func(int x, int y) { System.out.println("r:"); System.out.println(x + 7); } 4 ()->42 int func(){ return 42; } 5 (Apple a1 ,Apple a2) -> a1.
